name: outkast
title: Outkast
article:
A serene agency template with structured layouts, clean typography, and a light, inviting aesthetic.

(CC) = Content Collections

Features

  • Blog Tags
  • Reusable components
  • Search powered with Fuse JS
  • Content collections
  • Seo Optimized
  • Ongoing updates
  • Style guide
  • Astro RSS
  • Astro SEO
  • Astro Sitemap
  • Tailwind CSS Forms
  • Tailwind Typography
